Member Function Documentation

virtual ClothMeshDesc nv::cloth::ClothMeshQuadifier::getDescriptor (  )  const [pure virtual]

Returns a mesh descriptor with some triangle pairs converted to quads.

Note:
The returned descriptor is valid only within the lifespan of ClothMeshQuadifier class.

virtual bool nv::cloth::ClothMeshQuadifier::quadify ( const ClothMeshDesc &  desc  )  [pure virtual]

Convert triangles of ClothMeshDesc to quads.

In NvCloth, quad dominant mesh representations are preferable to pre-triangulated versions. In cases where the mesh has been already triangulated, this class provides a meachanism to convert (quadify) some triangles back to quad representations.

See also:
ClothFabricCooker
Parameters:
desc The cloth mesh descriptor prepared for cooking
